name: Eero Vainikko
content: Homepage of Eero Vainikko Homepage of Eero Vainikko Professor of Distributed Systems at the Institute of Computer Science, Faculty of Science and Technology, University of Tartu. Delta 3038; Address: Narva mnt. 18, Tartu 51009, Estonia e-mail: eero.vainikko (at) ut.ee phone: +372 7 37 5454 skype: evainikko CV Research interests: Parallel/Scientific Computing, Parallel solution of PDEs, Domain Decomposition methods, privacy-preserving parallel computing. Publications: [Google Scholar] Current teaching activities Parallel Computing (Fall 2023) Seminar on Distributed Systems One of my past homepages: http://www.ii.uib.no/~eero at parallab, Bergen, Norway Eero Vainikko, eero.vainikko (at) ut.ee
